Name: NaGongGan Infinite
About the game: '90's feeling first-person Retro Bujuk Action' 'old and Not old' 'If you break through all the stages, you are talented!' Welcome to the strange world. This game is an indie game made by a single developer. [NaGongGan Infinite] is a single-player only, first-person 3D action game. As a traditional fps game, you move, shoot, pick items, and break through stages. The ending opens by breaking through each stage and finally reaching the end of the road. To break through the stage, Kill monsters, Find a specific item, A portal to the next stage will open. All stages are open and you can play the ending. ■The Story A moon night, you stand at the start of the road. where is this? Why are you here? The guide says just follow the road. follow the road. There are bad guys standing in your way kill them all. break through, keep going And Check out the end of the road. What will be your destiny? ■Game Feature This Game is an easy and fast first-person shooter. There are ten short stages, and finding your way is easy. Feel the Retro Style primal action of the first-person shooter once again. Find items and skills, and Have fun beating the monsters. Be careful! The game also has an strange story and play flow. Journey on this strange road, you will enjoy. ■Run away! Avoid! Throw it!
